## Functions

### lto&#95;module&#95;is&#95;thinlto() {#gab4ebc07d5540166b4aeedfbbd2720757}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>lto&#95;bool&#95;t lto&#95;module&#95;is&#95;thinlto (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#ga3ce415fd9e8109d4835461c6de1b9d82">lto&#95;module&#95;t</a> mod)</>}>
Test if a module has support for ThinLTO linking.

<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00832">832</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;cross&#95;referenced&#95;symbol() {#ga04d8f6924e666ac75b707c5159935056}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;cross&#95;referenced&#95;symbol (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; name, int length)</>}>
Adds a symbol to the list of global symbols that are cross-referenced between ThinLTO files.

If the ThinLTO CodeGenerator can ensure that every references from a ThinLTO module to this symbol is optimized away, then the symbol can be discarded.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00854">854</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;module() {#gaa9e95873812d6c95eaed4669f5a8e218}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;module (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; identifier, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; data, int length)</>}>
Add a module to a ThinLTO code generator.

Identifier has to be unique among all the modules in a code generator. The data buffer stays owned by the client, and is expected to be available for the entire lifetime of the <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> it is added to.

On failure, returns NULL (check <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gae09912101ce40de1049e5bf6355f6137">lto&#95;get&#95;error&#95;message()</a> for details).


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00708">708</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;must&#95;preserve&#95;symbol() {#gaac473108a947da1a6b02d8bb32d50e23}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;add&#95;must&#95;preserve&#95;symbol (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; name, int length)</>}>
Adds a symbol to the list of global symbols that must exist in the final generated code.

If a function is not listed there, it might be inlined into every usage and optimized away. For every single module, the functions referenced from code outside of the ThinLTO modules need to be added here.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00842">842</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;disable&#95;codegen() {#ga22eabf983805c0999e0a9f76ac4fe38f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;disable&#95;codegen (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#a1f863f3727405a63300a2eaab9719e7a">lto&#95;bool&#95;t</a> disable)</>}>
Disable CodeGen, only run the stages till codegen and stop.

The output will be bitcode.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=19
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00809">809</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;dispose() {#gafa8eb4c3e5fa635e51c92a913fc19aca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;dispose (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg)</>}>
Frees the generator and all memory it internally allocated.

Upon return the <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> is no longer valid.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00695">695</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;process() {#gac2ddec507ad62cf885d333152a80bd9f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;process (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg)</>}>
Optimize and codegen all the modules added to the codegenerator using ThinLTO.

Resulting objects are accessible using <a href="#ga55822450a0ed1d0c2706c9bf194adb63">thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object()</a>.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;set&#95;pic&#95;model() {#ga1bdfd6ec585a2b80fbaef4d1c7d3141e}

<MemberDefinition

Sets which PIC code model to generate.

Returns true on error (check <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gae09912101ce40de1049e5bf6355f6137">lto&#95;get&#95;error&#95;message()</a> for details).

</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;set&#95;savetemps&#95;dir() {#ga3ec329f8acd2712922566a82b84ed896}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;codegen&#95;set&#95;savetemps&#95;dir (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; save_temps_dir)</>}>
Sets the path to a directory to use as a storage for temporary bitcode files.

The intention is to make the bitcode files available for debugging at various stage of the pipeline.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00782">782</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;create&#95;codegen() {#ga8ed1f0fc73822da5f1d749dffa8d8071}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t thinlto&#95;create&#95;codegen (void)</>}>
Instantiates a ThinLTO code generator.

Returns NULL on error (check <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gae09912101ce40de1049e5bf6355f6137">lto&#95;get&#95;error&#95;message()</a> for details).

The ThinLTOCodeGenerator is not intended to be reuse for multiple compilation: the model is that the client adds modules to the generator and ask to perform the ThinLTO optimizations / codegen, and finally destroys the codegenerator.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00687">687</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;object&#95;files() {#gab2701c474a2e855b522647d4403bc735}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned int thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;object&#95;files (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg)</>}>
Returns the number of object files produced by the ThinLTO CodeGenerator.

It usually matches the number of input files, but this is not a guarantee of the API and may change in future implementation, so the client should not assume it.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=21
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00752">752</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;objects() {#ga4b0d79fbe2182463fd0a8549669f661d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned int thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;objects (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg)</>}>
Returns the number of object files produced by the ThinLTO CodeGenerator.

It usually matches the number of input files, but this is not a guarantee of the API and may change in future implementation, so the client should not assume it.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00729">729</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object() {#ga55822450a0ed1d0c2706c9bf194adb63}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LTOObjectBuffer thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, unsigned int index)</>}>
Returns a reference to the ith object file produced by the ThinLTO CodeGenerator.

Client should use <code><a href="#ga4b0d79fbe2182463fd0a8549669f661d">thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;objects()</a></code> to get the number of available objects.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=18
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00740">740</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object&#95;file() {#ga6a623a3136782e9ae1a4b168c8231b67}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const char &#42; thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object&#95;file (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, unsigned int index)</>}>
Returns the path to the ith object file produced by the ThinLTO CodeGenerator.

Client should use <code><a href="#gab2701c474a2e855b522647d4403bc735">thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;num&#95;object&#95;files()</a></code> to get the number of available objects.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=21
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00763">763</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### thinlto&#95;set&#95;generated&#95;objects&#95;dir() {#ga6fd04a0b513b9eb915d5bc33a4a51945}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void thinlto&#95;set&#95;generated&#95;objects&#95;dir (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmclto/#gaad92d29c62685dde82e298596453c415">thinlto&#95;code&#95;gen&#95;t</a> cg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; save_temps_dir)</>}>
Set the path to a directory where to save generated object files.

This path can be used by a linker to request on-disk files instead of in-memory buffers. When set, results are available through <a href="#ga6a623a3136782e9ae1a4b168c8231b67">thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object&#95;file()</a> instead of <a href="#ga55822450a0ed1d0c2706c9bf194adb63">thinlto&#95;module&#95;get&#95;object()</a>.


<SectionUser title="Since">
LTO&#95;API&#95;VERSION=21
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h/#l00793">793</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/lto-h">lto.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
